website_summaries.verdict: Here is yet another charming addition to the classic Crest Vibe line. The Sperry Crest Vibe Chambray Stripe flaunts a head-turning striped canvas upper, which is laced up with the traditional rawhide barrel ties.But this model’s edge is not only with its styling. Its high level of comfort also collected raves and praises from consumers. Available at a budget-friendly price, this sneaker further proves to be worthy of belonging in anyone’s wardrobe. Perhaps it is also safe to say that a classic can still become classier.
pros: Several customers noted that the Sperry Crest Vibe Chambray Stripe is yet another proof of the brand’s consistent quality
Most testers lauded the astounding comfort it delivers to their feet
Plenty of shoppers got immediately hooked on its undeniably classy and adorable silhouette
A handful of wearers liked the lightweight, durable feel of the striped chambray material
More than a few shared about getting compliments while wearing the sneaker and getting asked where they bought it
It runs true to size, a majority of wearers agreed
Many buyers highly recommended the sneaker
Some users regarded the sneaker as perfectly suitable for everyday wear
An estate broker shared that she can work and walk in them all day long without having any issue
One customer appreciated that this model is available in both wide and medium widths
At least one mentioned that the sneaker is a terrific addition to her spring wardrobe
A lady who is addicted to Sperry sneakers declared that the Sperry Crest Vibe Chambray Stripe is her go-to pair
cons: The sneaker is only available in three colorways, which disappointed quite a few buyers

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Extremely adorable, comfortable, cute canvas shoe! I just wore these all over DC and never had any issues. I did break them in before hand, so that they were not stiff! Grab these if they are in your size you won't regret it!!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Noethlich

customer_reviews.title: Cute but didn’t fit
customer_reviews.text: Love the style and wear other Sperry canvas shoes, always fit well. This style was slightly too big.
customer_reviews.author: S. M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Really Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes to have something stylish and comfortable for a European Holiday. I am usually a 8 1/2N. These only come in medium width so I ordered an 8 1/2. They were too small so I reordered a 9 and they were perfect. They went from new shoes to me wearing them 20,000 step days and I had no rubbing or breaking in issues. I am tempted to order a back up pair so when these wear out, I will have another set.
customer_reviews.author: B Howard

customer_reviews.title: Shoe runs wide
customer_reviews.text: I wear a true size 9, and these shoes where way to wide. I returned them and third party didn't refund my money, and now Amazon is doing a review which takes 2-3 weeks! Also bought 3 pair of shoes from this third party and all 3 boxes where smashed. I want to return another pair ,but do not want to have to go through this long process again.
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: narrow
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't even try them on, ordered same size as other Sperry shoes. Very cute, think I would have gotten lots of use if they would have fit
customer_reviews.author: cossettekr

customer_reviews.title: Comfy shoe and fits well.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 9W. The shoes fit perfect. They are nice quality, cute and very comfy. I would definitely recommend this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: VickiRB

customer_reviews.title: Too tight.
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute, but they were extremely tight. And very uncomfortable on the top of my foot. However, I cut the ends on the laces, and just tied them off with a simple knot. And loosened the fit of the laces and they fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these shoes! They fit great and look so cute with jeans!!
customer_reviews.author: B. Weatherly

customer_reviews.title: Walked 8.5 miles in these!
customer_reviews.text: Such comfy stylish sneakers! I wore them at Disneyland and walked 8.5 miles before my feet felt sore and tired! I throw these on all the time now and love the neutral taupe and white stripes. I have a high arches and didn’t have an issue with these being too flat or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Do

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very good-looking shoe, very comfortable, excellent price and just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sperry tennis shoe striped
customer_reviews.text: I’m needing to break the shoes in and had to add a cushion that self-sticks to the backs as they hurt. They’re very cute and the support seems good.
customer_reviews.author: PKSreviewer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Cute
customer_reviews.text: I love love love these shoes. They are so comfortable and so cute. I plan to be walking all day on Saturday, and feel no need for breaking them in.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Hobson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Very nice and they look great with different outfits.
customer_reviews.author: BT6713

customer_reviews.title: I’m styling
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are worth every penny. The are stylish, comfortable and good on the pocketbook.
customer_reviews.author: shoe guru

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoe. Nasty blister
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe but the ONE time I wore them I developed a terrible blister on my heel. I let the blister heal and today I had to wear with a bandaid. Going to the cobbler tomorrow to see if he can fix. If not, they go back. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Real cute shoes but they were too tight across my arches
customer_reviews.author: Bubby3

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes, perfect summer sneaker when you don't want athletic shoes.
customer_reviews.author: LexBook

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes to throw on with jeans, capris whatever. Such a clean look!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl C

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes They can go with multiple outfits Easily wiped off and comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.author: Sundae Fassig

customer_reviews.title: Breaking them in stinks! But super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They are super cute! It’s been a very hard breaking in process though, two good blisters and some heel soreness but it will be worth it I am sure! They fit just right too!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Yenco

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable - great for walking and doing day to day chores
customer_reviews.author: Lana M. DeMartini

customer_reviews.title: They’re a little weird in the arch in the back
customer_reviews.text: They are a little weird when I walk in them but I’ll get used to it
customer_reviews.author: carolyn clifton

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and well-made. I will definitely buy other colors/prints.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne C.

customer_reviews.title: Great price! Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable and cute! I have 6 pairs of Sperry! Great add to my collection!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa meme

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes at dillards and I highly recommend them. They are so comfortable and super cute.. I want to get a few more pairs!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hare2406

product_meta.title: Sperry Women's Crest Vibe Chambray Stripe Sneaker
product_meta.description: Sperry Top-Sider women's crest vibe chambray stripe "Founded in 1935 by Paul Sperry, after a near death experience on a boat the Sperry Top Sider shoe was born and it was the first of it's kind as a boat shoe. Fast forward eight decades later, and Sperry boat shoes have evolved into sea-worthy, fashionable preppy shoes coveted by men, women, and children across the globe for their unique styles, comfort and durability. Shop for Sperry boat shoes here,and choose from a wide selection of hand-crafted footwear including leather and canvas sandals, leather and canvas boat shoes, leather loafers, printed espadrilles, sneakers, oxfords or boots in every style, print, color and size available.
feature_bullets: Lightweight canvas uppers in go-anywhere chambray
Rust-proof eyelets and genuine rawhide laces with barrel ties, for easy on/off and a secure fit
Moisture-wicking Dri-Lex material keeps feet cool and dry
Memory foam insoles provide comfort and arch support. Feels as good as it sounds
Non-marking rubber outsoles won't scuff floors but gives you sure footing, from beach to boardwalk
